mapper.select: SELECT mb.member_id,tmpmb.cellphone,tmpmb.realname,tmpmb.typename,tmpmb.gradename,tmpmb.integral,tmpmb.realtotalprice,tmpmb.createdate,tmpmb.sex,tmpmb.shopname FROM qkjvip_member_basic mb INNER JOIN tmp_qkjvip_member_basic tmpmb ON (mb.cellphone=tmpmb.cellphone and mb.shopname=tmpmb.shopname)
